Title: Women Without Men
Writer: Shoja Azari, Shirin Neshat (screenplay), Shahrnoush Parsipour (novel), Steven Henry Madoff (voiceovers and additional dialogue)
Actors: Shabnam Toloui, Pegah Ferydoni, Arita Shahrzad, Orsolya Tóth
Plot: Against the tumultuous backdrop of Iran's 1953 CIA-backed coup d'état, the destinies of four women converge in a beautiful orchard garden, where they find independence, solace and companionship.
Country: Germany, Austria, France, Italy, Ukraine, Morocco
